payload.description: Create new Course Catalog page for students to browse and enroll in courses. Add /courses route showing: (1) Grid of course cards with cover image, title, description, project count, (2) Enroll button for self-enrollment (calls POST /api/courses/:id/enroll), (3) Progress indicator for enrolled courses, (4) Filter/search by title or pillar. Add backend endpoint POST /api/courses/:id/enroll to create enrollment record. Add 'Courses' link to main navigation.
payload.context: Similar UI pattern to Quest Hub. Use course cover images. Students can self-enroll OR be assigned by advisors. Need user_courses or course_enrollments table to track enrollment.
